name: Base64 "Attachments" Regex
content:
Dear Sir,

I am sorry for my late response; our bank has credited 30% of
Total amount on invoice to your bank account, the balance will be paid
against BOL.

Find attached transfer TT which was initiated on the 11 of May and update u=
s on delivery schedule.

Best and Kind Regards

Your early reply is highly appreciated.

Thank You !
Regards
Mr. Adami Muhamed
(Purchasing Manager)
USA Office: +8610390291211
Tel : +18647593903
Land : +145384958354
E-mail: Adami@frutrilmeicaglobal.com
E-mail: sales@frutrilmeicaglobal.com
E-mail: costumerservice@frutrilmeicaglobal.com
FRUTRILMEICA GLOBAL COMPANY LIMITED.
